"A.P.242/2/17 10:10": "We were slightly off our target coordinates. Making straight for the center was a bit too greedy, after all."
"Oh well, we can amuse ourselves with some mayhem along the way."
"We won't let you destroy anything else!"
"...They've arrived sooner than expected. Did you perhaps predict this would happen, my inferior copy?"
"...We have come all this way. Why don't we destroy these ARKS, utterly and thoroughly?"
"Let us have a competition, to see who can dispose of the most trash."
"You may use any means. Just make sure to keep a proper count. It is a contest after all, it must be fair."
"Hehe, how diligent of them. I shall proceed at my own leisure."
"Are you watching, my copy? You must know what will follow."
"I have a message for all of ARKS. \"I wish you the best of luck.\""
